title: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When creating several report parameters and setting default values for them, the default values are not displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
OB: When I create several report parameters and only set default values for them, the default values are not shown in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
EB: When I create several report parameters and set default values for them, the default values should be displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for the report parameters.
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout.
4. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
5. Observe that the default values are not displayed in the dialog.
